  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void build()
    the method checks that the tower (attribute of the box) is not null in case it is null the method instantiate it than the method build a piece on the tower and if the tower is complete (we have builded a dome ) the method sets the box as occupied the method generates the TowerCompleteException if the tower has already a dome and we try to build on it.
    boolean equals​(Box b2)
    given a Box as @param
    int[] getCoord()  
    Tower getTower()  
    boolean isAdjacent​(Box b2)
    return true if the this Box and the parameter box are adjacent else return false two boxes are adjacent if (given a box of coordinate x,y) if the sum of x and y is no more than the sum of this x and y plus 2 or minus 2
    boolean isBorder()
    return true if the given box is a border box else return false
    boolean isOccupied()  
    boolean isReachable​(Box b)
    given @param Box b
    void setNotOccupied()
    sets the box as occupied
    void setOccupied()
    sets the box as not occupied

  • Constructor Details

    • Box

      public Box​(int coordX, int coordY)
      given
      Parameters:
      coordX - X coordinate on the board of the box
      coordY - Y coordinate on the board of the box build an instance of a Box which contains also a Tower instance initially set as null and an occupied flag

  • Method Details

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied()
      Returns:
      if the box is or is not occupied

    • setOccupied

      public void setOccupied()
      sets the box as not occupied

    • setNotOccupied

      public void setNotOccupied()
      sets the box as occupied

    • getTower

      public Tower getTower()
      Returns:
      the tower instance of the box

    • build

      public void build()
      the method checks that the tower (attribute of the box) is not null in case it is null the method instantiate it than the method build a piece on the tower and if the tower is complete (we have builded a dome ) the method sets the box as occupied the method generates the TowerCompleteException if the tower has already a dome and we try to build on it.

    • getCoord

      public int[] getCoord()
      Returns:
      an array of int in the 0 position we have the x coord. in the 1 position we ave y coordinate.

    • isReachable

      public boolean isReachable​(Box b)
      given @param Box b
      Returns:
      true if the Box b is reachable from the this Box a Box is reachable from another box if the two are adjacent(not checked here) and the destination (Box b) is higher no more than 1 level than start height (Box this)

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Box b2)
      given a Box as @param
      Returns:
      true if the given box represents the same box (in terms of coordinates) of the this Box

    • isAdjacent

      public boolean isAdjacent​(Box b2)
      return true if the this Box and the parameter box are adjacent else return false two boxes are adjacent if (given a box of coordinate x,y) if the sum of x and y is no more than the sum of this x and y plus 2 or minus 2

    • isBorder

      public boolean isBorder()
      return true if the given box is a border box else return false
